Weâ€™re sanitizing our hands, NOT a portal of entry and applying moisture holding, bacteria laden cloth to our mouths and noses.  Interesting.

Clarifying, as always, it doesnâ€™t bother me if you mask.  But, for so many reasons, including this one it should be a choice not a mandate.

My daughter explains how a hand washing experiment turned into a mask experiment.
